contentrichtext.text: '''Xavier Fagnon''' is a [[France|French]] [[voice acting|voice actor]] who specializes in dubbing. ==Roles== ===Theater animation=== *[[Over the Hedge (film)|Over the Hedge]] (Doctor Dennis ([[Joel McCrary]])) *[[Paprika (2006 film)|Paprika]] (Doctor Kōsaku Tokita ([[Tōru Furuya]])) ===Video games=== *[[Jak and Daxter (series)|Jak and Daxter series]] (Daxter ([[Max Casella]])) *[[SSX Tricky]] (JP) ===Dubbing roles=== *[[Commander in Chief (TV series)|Commander in Chief]] (Vince Taylor ([[Anthony Azizi]])) *[[The Dead Zone (TV series)|The Dead Zone]] (Johnny Smith ([[Anthony Michael Hall]])) *[[Fantastic Four (film)|Fantastic Four]] ([[Mister Fantastic]] ([[Ioan Gruffudd]])) *[[Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer]] ([[Mister Fantastic]] ([[Ioan Gruffudd]])) *[[Law & Order: Special Victims Unit]] ([[George Huang (Law & Order)|Doctor George Huang]] ([[B. D. Wong]])) *[[Lost (TV series)|Lost]] (Jack Shephard ([[Matthew Fox (actor)|Matthew Fox]])) *[[Sliders]] (Quinn Mallory ([[Robert Floyd]])) *[[The Pretender (TV series)|The Pretender]] (Angelo ([[Paul Dillon]])) *[[Threat Matrix]] (Mohammad 'Mo' Hassain (Anthony Azizi)) ===Non-Dub Related Roles=== *[[Mickey Mouse (2013 TV series)|Mickey Mouse]] "Croissant de Triomphe" (Customer) ==External links== * {{ann|people|64430}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Fagnon | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fagnon}} [[Category:French voice actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]]
